tool_description: Generates meeting scheduling options and draft meeting invitation emails based on participant availability constraints and meeting requirements.

meeting_purpose.description: Purpose or topic of the meeting

preferred_dates.description: Preferred meeting dates in ISO 8601 date format

time_zone.description: Time zone for the meeting (e.g., UTC, EST, PST)

meeting_type.description: Meeting format: in_person, video_call, phone_call, hybrid

error_messages: Invalid meeting duration: Duration must be between 15-480 minutes
Too few participants: At least 2 participants required
Too many participants: Maximum 20 participants supported
Invalid date format: Use ISO 8601 date-time format for preferred_dates
Invalid meeting type: Use one of [in_person, video_call, phone_call, hybrid]
Invalid urgency level: Use one of [low, medium, high]
Invalid time zone: Provide a valid time zone identifier
No preferred dates: At least one preferred date must be provided
usage: Specify meeting_purpose, participant_emails, preferred_dates, and duration_minutes. Optionally set time_zone, meeting_type, and urgency. The tool generates scheduling options and invitation email draft.

scheduling_options.description: List of available meeting time slots

calendar_link.description: Calendar booking link or meeting details
